segments.translated_content: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64
大家好！

segments.content: This week is "launch week" for Vercel which should make some nice announcements about React, Next.js and its cloud offer. We already have a small preview of what is coming very soon in Next.js!
segments.sourceMdx: This week is "launch week" for Vercel which should make some nice announcements about React, Next.js and its cloud offer. We already have a small preview of what is coming very soon in Next.js!
segments.translated_content: 本周是Vercel的"发布周"，预计将宣布有关React、Next.js及其云服务的重要消息。我们已经可以提前窥见Next.js即将推出的新功能！

segments.content: There are quite a few great articles to read this week, including some interactive ones. I particularly liked to learn more about Million.js and its concept of "block virtual DOM".
segments.sourceMdx: There are quite a few great articles to read this week, including some interactive ones. I particularly liked to learn more about Million.js and its concept of "block virtual DOM".
segments.translated_content: 本周有不少值得阅读的优秀文章，其中包括几篇交互式教程。我尤其喜欢深入了解Million.js及其"区块虚拟DOM"概念的内容。

segments.content: On the React-Native side, the macOS platform is catching up with the release of v0.71, and Expo makes it easier than ever to use local native modules.
segments.sourceMdx: On the React-Native side, the macOS platform is catching up with the release of v0.71, and Expo makes it easier than ever to use local native modules.
segments.translated_content: 在React-Native方面，macOS平台随着v0.71版本的发布正迎头赶上，而Expo使得使用本地原生模块比以往更加便捷。

segments.content: There are a lot of React conferences in the next weeks, we should have great announcements! By the way, you might see a flyer for my newsletter at one of them! I'm counting on you to convince your colleagues to sign up for the newsletter.
segments.sourceMdx: There are a lot of React conferences in the next weeks, we should have great announcements! By the way, you might see a flyer for my newsletter at one of them! I'm counting on you to convince your colleagues to sign up for the newsletter.
segments.translated_content: 未来几周将有多场React技术会议，预计会有重大公告！顺便说一句，你们可能会在某个会场看到我们新闻简讯的宣传单页——还请帮忙推荐同事订阅我们的简讯。

segments.content: Speaking of conferences, [React Summit](https://reactsummit.com/?utm_source=email\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) (Amsterdam June 2-6) is the biggest React conference in the world. They offer us a 5% discount (code "ThisWeekInReact5").
segments.sourceMdx: Speaking of conferences, [React Summit](https://reactsummit.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) (Amsterdam June 2-6) is the biggest React conference in the world. They offer us a 5% discount (code "ThisWeekInReact5").
segments.translated_content: 说到技术会议，[React Summit](https://reactsummit.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=thisweekinreact)（6月2-6日·阿姆斯特丹）是全球规模最大的React会议。主办方为我们提供了5%的折扣（优惠码"ThisWeekInReact5"）。

segments.content: Our **free and open source UI web app starter** offers a quick and easy way to bootstrap your next project. It includes **best practices & production ready tools** to help you get started right away, saving you time and effort in the initial setup phase.
segments.sourceMdx: Our **free and open source UI web app starter** offers a quick and easy way to bootstrap your next project. It includes **best practices & production ready tools** to help you get started right away, saving you time and effort in the initial setup phase.
segments.translated_content: 我们免费开源的Web应用UI启动器能快速搭建新项目，内置**最佳实践与生产级工具**，助您跳过繁琐的初始化配置阶段。

segments.content: Comes with built-in **features** like 🔐 Authentication, 📱Responsive Layout, 🧑‍💻 User Management, 🇫🇷 Internationalization & Right-to-Left support, 🌚 Dark Mode, 🎛 Advanced components for easy development. You can try out the [example app](https://demo.start-ui.com).
segments.sourceMdx: Comes with built-in **features** like 🔐 Authentication, 📱Responsive Layout, 🧑‍💻 User Management, 🇫🇷 Internationalization & Right-to-Left support, 🌚 Dark Mode, 🎛 Advanced components for easy development. You can try out the [example app](https://demo.start-ui.com).
segments.translated_content: 集成功能包括：🔐 认证系统、📱响应式布局、🧑‍💻 用户管理、🇫🇷 国际化与右向文字支持、🌚 暗色模式、🎛️ 高级组件库。可体验[示例应用](https://demo.start-ui.com)。

segments.content: Ready to use with **TypeScript**, **NextJS**, Chakra UI, TanStack Query, Storybook and more.
segments.sourceMdx: Ready to use with **TypeScript**, **NextJS**, Chakra UI, TanStack Query, Storybook and more.

[🚀 GitHub上的Start UI [web]](https://web.start-ui.com)
## ⚛️ React动态 {#react}
[![Vercel存储解决方案发布](/emails/issues/144/vercel.jpg)](https://vercel.com/blog/vercel-storage)
**[Vercel存储解决方案正式发布](https://vercel.com/blog/vercel-storage)**

segments.content: Vercel has just launched its edge-first storage offering, particularly suited for use in React Server Components and Next.js:
segments.sourceMdx: Vercel has just launched its edge-first storage offering, particularly suited for use in React Server Components and Next.js:
segments.translated_content: Vercel最新推出面向边缘计算的存储服务，特别适配React服务端组件与Next.js：

segments.content:
* Vercel KV: store key-value Redis, based on Upstash.
* Vercel Postgres: PostgreSQL database, based on Neon.
* Vercel Blob: file storage, based on Cloudflare R2.
segments.sourceMdx:
- Vercel KV: store key-value Redis, based on Upstash.
- Vercel Postgres: PostgreSQL database, based on Neon.
- Vercel Blob: file storage, based on Cloudflare R2.
segments.translated_content:
- Vercel KV：基于Upstash的键值存储（Redis）
- Vercel Postgres：基于Neon的PostgreSQL数据库
- Vercel Blob：基于Cloudflare R2的文件存储

segments.content: It's [Vercel Ship week](https://vercel.com/ship): more news should be announced in the next few days. The image chosen leads us to believe that there will be a Next.js release tomorrow, introducing a new feature **Next.js Server Actions**. This also reveals the will to improve [progressive enhancement](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1653701538336915456) in React apps, in a way quite similar to Remix: this form can also work without JavaScript or hydration.
segments.sourceMdx: It's [Vercel Ship week](https://vercel.com/ship): more news should be announced in the next few days. The image chosen leads us to believe that there will be a Next.js release tomorrow, introducing a new feature **Next.js Server Actions**. This also reveals the will to improve [progressive enhancement](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1653701538336915456) in React apps, in a way quite similar to Remix: this form can also work without JavaScript or hydration.
segments.translated_content: 当前正值[Vercel Ship发布周](https://vercel.com/ship)，更多消息将在近日公布。配图暗示明日Next.js将发布支持**服务端操作(Server Actions)**的新版本，此举旨在通过类似Remix的方式提升React应用的[渐进增强](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1653701538336915456)能力——该表单示例可在无JavaScript或水合状态下正常运行。

segments.content: Note: this example is not vulnerable to SQL injections because it uses template literals.
segments.sourceMdx: Note: this example is not vulnerable to SQL injections because it uses template literals.
segments.translated_content: 注：此示例使用模板字面量，不存在SQL注入漏洞。
[![Million.js - 区块虚拟DOM回归](/emails/issues/144/million.jpg)](https://millionjs.org/blog/virtual-dom)
**[Million.js - 区块虚拟DOM回归](https://millionjs.org/blog/virtual-dom)**

segments.content: Interactive article that presents Million.js and its "Block Virtual DOM" concept. Its approach to diffing is different: non-recursive, based on static analysis, compilation and dirty checking, quite similar to Svelte.
segments.sourceMdx: Interactive article that presents Million.js and its "Block Virtual DOM" concept. Its approach to diffing is different: non-recursive, based on static analysis, compilation and dirty checking, quite similar to Svelte.
segments.translated_content: 互动文章介绍Million.js及其"区块虚拟DOM"概念。其差异比对(diffing)机制独树一帜：采用基于静态分析、编译和脏检查的非递归方式，与Svelte的思路颇为相似。

segments.content: Million.js does not replace React, but integrates with it to improve performance. It is recommended to use it only in some very specific cases: a lot of static content and UI trees with a stable structure.
segments.sourceMdx: Million.js does not replace React, but integrates with it to improve performance. It is recommended to use it only in some very specific cases: a lot of static content and UI trees with a stable structure.
segments.translated_content: Million.js并非替代React，而是与之集成以提升性能。建议仅在特定场景使用：包含大量静态内容且UI树结构稳定的情况。
[![React渲染机制交互式指南](/emails/issues/144/rendering.jpg)](https://ui.dev/why-react-renders)
**[React渲染机制交互式指南](https://ui.dev/why-react-renders)**

segments.content: Interactive article that explains when React re-render a component. A good resource for beginners, with detailed explanations on setState(fn), batching, memo, StrictMode etc...
segments.sourceMdx: Interactive article that explains when React re-render a component. A good resource for beginners, with detailed explanations on setState(fn), batching, memo, StrictMode etc...
segments.translated_content: 通过交互形式解析React组件重渲染时机的优质教程。适合初学者学习setState(fn)、批处理、memo、StrictMode等核心概念。

segments.content:
* 🐦 [Dan Abramov - "If we thought Qwik model was better we would have literally implemented it"](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/1651055386101796864)
* 🐦 [CSS scoping - upcoming CSS feature useful for React devs](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1653432768544534531)
* 📜 [Making animated tooltip with React and Framer Motion](https://sinja.io/blog/animated-tooltip-with-react-framer-motion): interactive article that implements a nice tooltip system with Floating UI and beautiful Frame Motion layout animations.
* 📜 [Building a Type-Safe Tailwind with vanilla-extract](https://www.highlight.io/blog/typesafe-tailwind): Tailwind is a good solution, but still has some flaws. This article gives an in-depth look at Vanilla-Extract / Sprinkles, a good typesafe alternative.
* 📜 [The URL is the ultimate global state management tool](https://www.jacobparis.com/guides/url-as-state-management): encourages the use of query-string, with some React examples.
* 📜 [Find and fix performance bottlenecks in your Remix app with Server Timing](https://www.jacobparis.com/guides/remix-server-timing)
* 📜 [Building a WebGL Carousel with React Three Fiber and GSAP](https://tympanus.net/codrops/2023/04/27/building-a-webgl-carousel-with-react-three-fiber-and-gsap/)
* 📜 [Server Components vs. SSR](https://www.webscope.io/blog/server-components-vs-ssr)
* 📜 [Best YouTube Channels to learn React in 2023](https://www.code-insights.dev/posts/best-youtube-channels-to-learn-react-in-2023)
* 📦 [Qwik v1.0](https://www.builder.io/blog/qwik-v1): official v1 release of a framework that challenges React with its resumability concept. React can be used in a Qwik application, which should facilitate the adoption.
* 📦 [Lingui 4.0](https://lingui.dev/blog/2023/04/26/announcing-lingui-4.0): overview of the i18n lib, and presents the new v4 features. This lib looks like a good alternative to React-Intl: ICU syntax, message extraction, framework-agnostics, React support...
* 📦 [Remix 1.16](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/releases/tag/remix%401.16.0): stabilizes support for CSS Modules, CSS imports, Vanilla Extract, PostCSS, Tailwind...
* 📦 [React-Router 6.11](https://twitter.com/remix_run/status/1652000618620555264)
* 🎥 [45% failed Dan's Server Component Quiz](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AGAax7WzStc)
* 🎥 [Reactathon 2023 Day 1 Livestream](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gJaN9CnFqrI)
* 🎙️ [The React Core team talks React Forget and the future](https://twitter.com/PodRocketpod/status/1653429138387243010)
* 👥 [React Summit](https://reactsummit.com/?utm_source=email\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) (Amsterdam, June 2-6) is offering us -5% on tickets (code "ThisWeekInReact5").

- 🐦 [Dan Abramov - "若认为Qwik模型更优，我们早该直接实现它了"](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/1651055386101796864)

- 📦 [Lingui 4.0国际化方案](https://lingui.dev/blog/2023/04/26/announcing-lingui-4.0)：支持ICU语法、消息提取、框架无关的React方案
- 📦 [Remix 1.16稳定版](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/releases/tag/remix%401.16.0)：支持CSS Modules、Vanilla Extract等现代CSS方案

- 🎥 [Reactathon 2023首日直播回放](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gJaN9CnFqrI)

segments.content: The [Nylas Email and Calendar APIs](https://www.nylas.com/?utm_source=TWIR\&utm_medium=sponsoredemail\&utm_campaign=FY23Q2-TWIR-2P-DSU\&utm_content\&utm_term) allow developers to build communications features that connect them to all major service providers in the world - with a single integration.

segments.content: Nylas makes selecting a use case and a server-side SDK language easy. You'll get a [step-by-step tutorial complete with a **ready-to-use React frontend**](https://www.nylas.com/blog/how-to-build-email-templates-with-react/?utm_source=TWIR\&utm_medium=sponsoredemail\&utm_campaign=FY23Q2-TWIR-2P-DSU\&utm_content=\&utm_term=) and download-ready codebase with your API credentials. Stop building and maintaining individual integrations with multiple providers and [start launching email and calendar features](https://www.nylas.com/?utm_source=TWIR\&utm_medium=sponsoredemail\&utm_campaign=FY23Q2-TWIR-2P-DSU\&utm_content\&utm_term) with guaranteed 99.99% uptime and no maintenance downtime.

Stop building and maintaining individual integrations with multiple providers and [start launching email and calendar features](https://www.nylas.com/?utm_source=TWIR&utm_medium=sponsoredemail&utm_campaign=FY23Q2-TWIR-2P-DSU&utm_content&utm_term) with guaranteed 99.99% uptime and no maintenance downtime.
segments.translated_content: Nylas简化了用例选择和服务器端SDK语言的流程。您将获得[包含**即用型React前端**的逐步教程](https://www.nylas.com/blog/how-to-build-email-templates-with-react/?utm_source=TWIR&utm_medium=sponsoredemail&utm_campaign=FY23Q2-TWIR-2P-DSU&utm_content=&utm_term=)以及可下载的代码库（含API凭证）。无需再为多个供应商单独构建和维护集成，[立即启动电子邮件和日历功能](https://www.nylas.com/?utm_source=TWIR&utm_medium=sponsoredemail&utm_campaign=FY23Q2-TWIR-2P-DSU&utm_content&utm_term)，享受99.99%的运行时间保证且无维护停机。
[立即免费使用Nylas开始构建！](https://dashboard.nylas.com/register?utm_source=TWIR&utm_medium=sponsoredemail&utm_campaign=FY23Q2-TWIR-2P-DSU&utm_content=&utm_term=)
## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}
[![React Native macOS 0.71发布](/emails/issues/144/rnmacos.jpg)](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/react-native/2023-04-27-announcing-macos-71/)
**[React Native macOS 0.71发布](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/react-native/2023-04-27-announcing-macos-71/)**

segments.content: Microsoft skipped the v0.69 and v0.70 releases to go directly to v0.71. The goal is now to stay up to date with the other platforms: v0.72 work is in progress. This platform version alignment looks super useful: according to feedback it is not easy to mix different React-Native versions within a single monorepo.
segments.sourceMdx: Microsoft skipped the v0.69 and v0.70 releases to go directly to v0.71. The goal is now to stay up to date with the other platforms: v0.72 work is in progress. This platform version alignment looks super useful: according to feedback it is not easy to mix different React-Native versions within a single monorepo.
segments.translated_content: 微软跳过了v0.69和v0.70版本，直接发布v0.71。现在的目标是与其他平台保持同步：v0.72的开发正在进行中。这种平台版本对齐非常实用：根据反馈，在单一monorepo中混合使用不同React-Native版本并不容易。

segments.content: The newly released v0.71 brings experimental support for Fabric, as well as all the new features that have recently been released on other platforms: TypeScript, Flexbox... Microsoft and Meta collaborate and the use of this platform seems to grow within the 2 companies: Meta uses React-Native macOS on Messenger Desktop for example.
segments.sourceMdx: The newly released v0.71 brings experimental support for Fabric, as well as all the new features that have recently been released on other platforms: TypeScript, Flexbox... Microsoft and Meta collaborate and the use of this platform seems to grow within the 2 companies: Meta uses React-Native macOS on Messenger Desktop for example.
segments.translated_content: 新发布的v0.71带来了对Fabric的实验性支持，以及最近在其他平台发布的所有新功能：TypeScript、Flexbox...微软和Meta展开合作，该平台在两家公司内部的使用率正在增长：例如Meta在Messenger Desktop中使用了React-Native macOS。

segments.content:
* 🧵 [File-based Expo Router demo](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1652404780881289216): Evan Bacon offers a complete Expo Router demo with mobile and web support.
* 🐦 [`npx create-expo-module --local`](https://twitter.com/aleqsio/status/1651268836593655808): great new Expo feature that makes it easy to create a local native module, without needing a monorepo.
* 🐦 [`npx create-expo`](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1652372955450441729): command to create a new Expo project.
* 🐦 [Bluesky app (iOS + Android + web) built by 1 dev with Expo](https://twitter.com/GergelyOrosz/status/1652679796818694146): Gergely Orosz's statement is causing a lot of debate on Twitter.
* 📦 [Ignite v8.7.0](https://twitter.com/ir_ignite/status/1651064452781953024): replaces the e2e Detox tests with Maestro.
* 📦 [Tamagui 1.17 - selectionStyles](https://twitter.com/tamagui_js/status/1651432667412566016)
* 📦 [react-native-iconify](https://github.com/oktaysenkan/react-native-iconify)
* 📦 [react-native-dnd](https://github.com/mgcrea/react-native-dnd)
* 📦 [react-native-use-list](https://github.com/dozsolti/react-native-use-list)
* 🎥 [How React Native Was Created At Facebook](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=On9ghjix77c): Christopher Chedeau looks back at the history of React-Native, a project he more or less saved from a probable death.
* 🎥 [React Native Transitions with Skia](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PzKWpwmmRqM): William Candillon shows how to use image transitions based on shaders and gestures. This may require some adaptation of existing glsl shaders.
* 🎥 [Is this the Worst Volume Control? React Native and Reanimated](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FqdcRBqVS78)
* 🎙️ [RNR 265 - Chain React is Back!!](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-265-chain-react-is-back)
* 👥 [App.js](https://appjs.co/) (Krakow, May 10-12) is offering us [-20% on workshops](https://ti.to/appjs/2023/discount/ThisWeekinReact20) (code "ThisWeekinReact20").
* 👥 [Chain React](https://chainreactconf.com/) (Portland, May 18-19) is offering us -10% on entries (code "thisweekinreact").
* 👥 [React-Native-Connection](https://reactnativeconnection.io/) (Paris, 1er June) is offering us -10% on entries (code "REACTHEBDO").

segments.translated_content:
- 🧵 [基于文件的Expo路由演示](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1652404780881289216)：Evan Bacon提供了完整的Expo路由演示，支持移动端和网页端。
- 🐦 [`npx create-expo-module --local`](https://twitter.com/aleqsio/status/1651268836593655808)：Expo新功能，轻松创建本地原生模块，无需monorepo。
- 🐦 [`npx create-expo`](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1652372955450441729)：创建新Expo项目的命令。
- 🐦 [Bluesky应用（iOS+Android+网页）由1名开发者使用Expo构建](https://twitter.com/GergelyOrosz/status/1652679796818694146)：Gergely Orosz的声明在Twitter上引发热议。
- 📦 [Ignite v8.7.0](https://twitter.com/ir_ignite/status/1651064452781953024)：用Maestro替换了e2e Detox测试。
- 📦 [Tamagui 1.17 - selectionStyles](https://twitter.com/tamagui_js/status/1651432667412566016)
- 📦 [react-native-iconify](https://github.com/oktaysenkan/react-native-iconify)
- 📦 [react-native-dnd](https://github.com/mgcrea/react-native-dnd)
- 📦 [react-native-use-list](https://github.com/dozsolti/react-native-use-list)
- 🎥 [React Native在Facebook的诞生历程](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=On9ghjix77c)：Christopher Chedeau回顾React-Native的历史，这个项目几乎被他从可能的消亡中拯救出来。
- 🎥 [使用Skia实现React Native过渡效果](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PzKWpwmmRqM)：William Candillon展示如何基于着色器和手势实现图像过渡。可能需要调整现有的glsl着色器。
- 🎥 [这是最糟糕的音量控制吗？React Native和Reanimated](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FqdcRBqVS78)
- 🎙️ [RNR 265 - Chain React回归！！](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-265-chain-react-is-back)
- 👥 [App.js](https://appjs.co/)（克拉科夫，5月10-12日）为我们提供[研讨会20%折扣](https://ti.to/appjs/2023/discount/ThisWeekinReact20)（优惠码"ThisWeekinReact20"）。
- 👥 [Chain React](https://chainreactconf.com/)（波特兰，5月18-19日）为我们提供门票10%折扣（优惠码"thisweekinreact"）。
- 👥 [React-Native-Connection](https://reactnativeconnection.io/)（巴黎，6月1日）为我们提供门票10%折扣（优惠码"REACTHEBDO"）。
## 🧑‍💻 职位 {#jobs}
🧑‍💼 [**Passionfroot - 高级全栈工程师（Remix）- €160k+，柏林/远程**](https://passionfroot.recruitee.com/o/senior-fullstack-engineer)

segments.content: Passionfroot's mission is to empower the independent businesses of tomorrow via YouTube, Podcasts, Social Media, and Newsletters. Join us in building a tool that will empower creators globally to build scalable, sustainable businesses.
segments.sourceMdx: Passionfroot's mission is to empower the independent businesses of tomorrow via YouTube, Podcasts, Social Media, and Newsletters. Join us in building a tool that will empower creators globally to build scalable, sustainable businesses.
segments.translated_content: Passionfroot的使命是通过YouTube、播客、社交媒体和新闻通讯赋能未来的独立企业。加入我们，共同打造一个工具，帮助全球创作者建立可扩展、可持续的业务。

segments.content: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - Senior React Native Developer - Fully Remote, PLN 21-32k net on B2B, monthly**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)
segments.sourceMdx: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - Senior React Native Developer - Fully Remote, PLN 21-32k net on B2B, monthly**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)
segments.translated_content: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - 高级React Native开发者 - 完全远程，B2B月薪净额21-32k PLN**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)

segments.content: Do you want to work on the world's most used apps? Would you like to co-create the React Native technology? Join the Callstack team of React & React Native leaders. Check our website for more details. We are looking forward to seeing your application - show us what you've got!
segments.sourceMdx: Do you want to work on the world's most used apps? Would you like to co-create the React Native technology? Join the Callstack team of React & React Native leaders. Check our website for more details. We are looking forward to seeing your application - show us what you've got!
segments.translated_content: 你想为世界上最常用的应用工作吗？你想共同创造React Native技术吗？加入Callstack的React & React Native领导者团队。查看我们的网站了解更多详情。我们期待看到你的申请——展示你的实力！
🧑‍💼 [**G2i - 100%远程React Native职位**](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i/status/1563204813881425926?s=20&t=ArRLC77BpRwXXCdx8fnUqw)

segments.content: We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is \~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe\_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.
segments.sourceMdx: We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is ~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.
segments.translated_content: 我们有几个React Native开发者的职位空缺！薪资约16万美元外加10%奖金。必须有RN生产经验且位于美国。私信[@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i)了解更多，别忘了提及This Week in React。
💡 [如何发布职位？](https://thisweekinreact.com/sponsor)
